name: TRUCALLER
description: A telegram bot which gather information about an indian phone number(Gather results from both Truecaller and eyecon)

API_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

T_AUTH.description: Your Truecaller auth_id from truecaller app request headers

E_AUTH.description: Your Eyecon auth_id from eyecon app request headers

E_AUTH_V.description: Your Eyecon e_auth_v value from eyecon app request headers

E_AUTH_C.description: Your Eyecon e_auth_c value from eyecon app request headers
